message: Since waiting will cost you 10% of the value each round, this 40% share is better for you than getting a larger share later. Let's make a deal now.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share since the value of money doesn't decrease for you, but I still want a larger portion.
Your $3500 now is worth more than $4000+ after another round due to the 10% depreciation. This is your best option to maximize your real value.
Even with depreciation, I believe I can get a better deal than your previous offer. This is my counteroffer.
Due to 34.4% depreciation, your $3000 now is worth more than $5800 in the next round. Further delays will only decrease your real value. This is your best opportunity to maximize your actual return.
